entry.title: Launching Pglet
entry.summary: Today we are officially launching Pglet!

entry.title: Introducing Pglet
entry.summary: Pglet (pronounced as "pagelet") empowers DevOps to easily add rich user interface into their internal apps and utilities without any knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
